tool.name: pp.filter_genes
tool.description: Filter genes based on number of cells or counts

param.name: min_counts
param.label: Minimum number of counts required for a gene to pass filtering

param.name: max_counts
param.label: Maximum number of counts required for a gene to pass filtering

param.name: min_cells
param.label: Minimum number of cells expressed required for a gene to pass filtering

param.name: max_cells
param.label: Maximum number of cells expressed required for a gene to pass filtering

data.name: counts_per_gene
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Counts per genes after filtering

data.name: cells_per_gene
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Number of cells per genes after filtering

tool.help:
Filter genes based on number of cells or counts
Keep genes that have at least `min_counts` counts or are expressed in at least `min_cells` cells or have at most `max_counts` counts or are expressed in at most `max_cells` cells.
Only provide one of the optional parameters `min_counts`, `min_cells`, `max_counts`, `max_cells` per call.
Return ------
number_per_gene : Number per genes (either `n_counts` or `n_genes` per cell)
More details on the `scanpy documentation <https://scanpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api/scanpy.api.pp.filter_genes.html#scanpy.api.pp.filter_genes>`__
